title: Graphic Map-Based Computer Probability Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based learning environment emphasizing practical probability modeling applications.

learning_goals: Learners can solve probability problems with ≥85% accuracy using static/dynamic graphic maps based on corporate decision-making scenarios.
Learners can achieve ≥70% correct response rates in transfer problem-solving using static motion cue graphic maps and interactive animation tools.
Learners can visualize problem-solving processes by incorporating ≥3 instances of image and motion representations in note-taking.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
